videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: My commander has a thirst for blood.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a monored Madness vampire deck, featuring Ivora, Insatiable Heir as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro 
01:44 - Deck Tech
09:40 - vs The Gitrog Monster
15:24 - vs Obosh, the Preypiercer
22:42 - vs Baba Lysaga, Night Witch
30:59 - vs Tatyova, Benthic Druid
36:04 - vs Daxos, Blessed by the Sun
40:37 - vs Krydle of Baldur's Gate
45:54 - vs Athreos, God of Passage
49:33 - vs Orvar, the All-Form
